articles.title: Gainers and Losers: 10 stocks that moved the most on December 6 - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The Sensex and the Nifty rose to new highs on December 6, extending the record run to a third day. Most sectors ended in the green with capital goods, FMCG, information technology, oil & gas and power gaining up to 2 percent
